episodes.title: NXIVM Underground Cult is STILL Alive | Sarah Edmondson
episodes.description:
FULL EPISODE: https://youtu.be/gw5nhlRiMB8

NXIVM didn’t just recruit vulnerable people — they infiltrated the homes, wallets, and social circles of the ultra-rich.
From Tourette’s “miracle cures” to pseudo-scientific therapy sessions, Keith Raniere built a pipeline straight to billionaires like the Bronfman sisters and the Baskin-Robbins heiress, convincing them that he alone held the key to unlocking their hidden potential.

SARAH'S LINKS:
IG: https://www.instagram.com/sarahedmondson/?hl=en
X: https://x.com/sarahjedmondson
NEW BOOK: https://www.sarahedmondson.com/book
YT: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=a+little+bit+culty

Inside this clip:

How NXIVM staged fake medical breakthroughs

Why the Bronfmans handed over their fortune

The disturbing “hope manipulation” Keith used on recruits

How Sarah was brought in through a personal connection

The cult pipeline that mirrored Wild Wild Country

The insane story of an heiress who gave Keith everything she owned

No sensationalism.
No speculation.
Just what really happened inside NXIVM’s elite-targeting machine.

Watch the full conversation on the Julian Dorey Podcast.
@juliandoreyclips

episodes.title: Ex-Apple Insider: "Working at Apple Felt Like a Cult..." | Joe Weil
episodes.description:
FULL EPISODE: https://youtu.be/PYcy5ZkLvaw

Why would a former Apple insider walk away from one of the most powerful companies on Earth? Joe Weil explains why Apple operates like a cult, how your data is quietly handed over, and why the company’s “privacy” branding isn’t what it seems.

JOE's LINKS:
- UNPLUGGED PHONE: https://unplugged.com/products/up-phone
- IG: https://www.instagram.com/weare_unplugged/

From Apple’s hidden deals to the rise of spyware like Pegasus, Joe reveals how smartphones have become the perfect tool for surveillance—and why even Apple can’t protect you from it.

Inside this episode:

Why Apple is run like a cult from the inside

How your data is shared despite Apple’s “privacy” promise

Why spyware like Pegasus proves Apple can’t stop surveillance

Joe Weil’s unplugged phone solution to fight back

The real cost of convenience in the smartphone era

🔔 Subscribe to Julian Dorey Clips for more explosive conversations with insiders, whistleblowers, and experts exposing the truths big tech doesn’t want you to know.
